document.full_text: improved weather conditions allowed texas firefighters to mount an offensive overnight against wildfires that have charred more than 1.8 million acres across the state and killed two responders this year, officials said on friday.
document.title: cooler, wet weather gives texas firefighters a break
lines_and_colors: improved weather conditions allowed texas firefighters to mount an offensive overnight against wildfires that have charred more than 1.8 million acres across the state and killed two responders this year, officials said on friday.
